wikipedia_page.main: Michael Wight (born 21 November 1964, in the Cayman Islands) is a Cayman Islands cricketer. A right-handed batsman and leg spin bowler, he has played for the Cayman Islands national cricket team since the year 2000.

link_mentions.page: 2007 ICC World Cricket League Division Three

response: Philip Wight made his debut for the Cayman Islands in the 2000 Americas Championship at the Maple Leaf Cricket Club in King City, Ontario, playing against the USA.Other matches played by Philip Wight at Cricket Archive His brothers Christopher, David and Michael also made their debuts in the same match.Other matches played by Christopher, David and Michael Wight at Cricket Archive Later in the year, he played his only List A match against Guyana in the Red Stripe Bowl.List A matches played by Philip Wight at Cricket Archive
